entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite Database seems to maintain lock on file #27139
  • SqliteDataRecord.GetStream only works with 32-bit keys #27138
  • What collection type should be use for relations to use in domain model #27137

Closed

  • Incorrect optional dependent (owned type) warning when saving optional dependent with the _same_ data #26712
    7.0.0
  • EF Core Migration Bundles: no way to passthrough custom args to generated efbundle #26945
    6.0.2
  • Using EF Core with #27090
  • Do not map annotation to database during migrations #27048
  • With .NET 6, Some Navigation scenario doesn't contain column from Left join in Order By caluse #27114
  • "The entity of type ... does not have any property with a non-default value to identify whether the entity exists" #27111

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the default schema for migration data operations. #27143
  • [release/6.0] Stop prefixing check constraints. #27142
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Remove quirk for #26602 #27140
  • Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure #27135

Merged

  • Don't issue a warning when replacing an optional dependent with non-null values #27136
  • [release/6.0] Bundles: Allow argument separator (--) #27128
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27141
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27127
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Avoid proxying Clone methods on record types #27125
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
  • [release/6.0] Query: Avoid stackoverflow in lifting group by aggregate term #27131
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to CollectionResultExpression #27134
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
